import React, { useContext } from 'react' import '../Form.css' import { useAuth } from '../context/AuthContext'; const FormSignup = ({submitForm}) => { const emailRef = useRef() const passwordRef = useRef() const passwordConfirmRef = useRef() const {signup} = useAuth() function handleSubmit(e) { e.preventDefault() signup(emailRef.current.value, passwordRef.current.value) } return(
